text: Coffee and pubes are the distillation of the college experience, clearly.

Audiobooks. After loading them my long-run mileage has gone up because I don't want to come home. Commutes fly by. Repetitive tasks are less tedious. It's easy to skim forward and pick up my place when I can sit down with the actual book. There are a lot of moments in the day that don't require full attention that can be leveraged to pick up the pace. Opened my eyes a bit to explore the possibility of switching between environments depending on where I might find myself through the day.
